body.content:
Dear Sir,

My name is David Fernandez, a retired Investment
Banker. I have a former client who has earmarked some funds to invest
in a joint venture or partnership. My client is a
Turkish citizen, who belongs to the elite political class. For this
reason, she wants to remain anonymous.

We can discuss further if you are interested in partnering with us.
Expecting your feedback soon

Kind regards,
Dave
